data.message: hello. Someone is using a fake account with my name and photo. how can i report about this...............

replies.message: Hi Muizz. Here are steps you can take to report someone pretending to be you: http://bit.ly/2bC2LGZ. -Rey
actually m blocked by him now what should i do
Hi Muizz. If you think an account is pretending to be you but you can't see it, follow these steps to report it: http://bit.ly/2bCfh9s. -Jessica

my cousin is not  Facebook she went to the hacked account it asking her for the url of the person cannot access that and then it throws her out saying it's working to fix the problem and request cannot be process

Hi Daniel. If you're temporarily blocked from sharing posts on Facebook, it may be because you shared too much in a short amount of time, or shared posts that were marked as unwelcome. Learn more: http://bit.ly/2oFHZJh. -Brittany
